Text:
Pam once gave a Canadian gymnast $10,000 to train and get her to a championship meet. This along with all her other charity work, generosity, and love, make her a true champion in life. Pam is my vote for Canadian Ambassador anytime, anywhere.
She makes me proud to be a Canadian.
Bart.

To all haters: Don't bother... You couldn't hold a candle to this woman.
